emerging_technologies.name: Decentralized Robot Control
emerging_technologies.description: A system allowing robots to operate autonomously with decentralized control, using blockchain for ownership and task management.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Increased trust in personal robotics, potential privacy concerns due to data handling, and changes in how we view property and control.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Requires widespread blockchain adoption, user comfort with decentralized systems, and legal frameworks to support such technologies.

emerging_technologies.name: Neuralink-Enabled Companion Robots
emerging_technologies.description: Companion robots that can interpret and respond to human thoughts and emotions through Neuralink technology.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Could revolutionize personal interactions, raise ethical issues about privacy and autonomy, and affect social dynamics.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: High cost, ethical debates, and the need for advanced neural interfaces to be both safe and reliable.

emerging_technologies.name: Personal Autonomous Vehicles
emerging_technologies.description: Vehicles designed for individual use with full autonomy, integrated with smart city systems for traffic management.
emerging_technologies.societal_implications: Reduction in traffic accidents, changes in urban planning, potential job displacement in transportation sectors.
emerging_technologies.adoption_factors: Legal and regulatory approval, public trust in autonomous driving technology, infrastructure development.

mainstream_technologies.name: Smart Home Robotics
mainstream_technologies.description: Robots designed for home maintenance, cleaning, and personal assistance, now becoming common in households.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Widespread adoption in affluent areas, with growing acceptance in middle-class homes. Integration with IoT devices is common.

mainstream_technologies.name: Blockchain for Identity Verification
mainstream_technologies.description: Using blockchain for secure identity verification, particularly for robots and IoT devices.
mainstream_technologies.adoption_status: Becoming standard in sectors requiring high security and trust, like financial services and government.

epoch_themes.description: Personal robots become increasingly integrated into daily life, enhancing personal and household functionalities.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Shifts in job markets, new forms of social interaction, and potential changes in family dynamics. Concerns about privacy and security are prominent.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Aligns with trends towards automation, AI, and the Internet of Things, pushing forward the concept of smart homes and cities.

epoch_themes.description: Discussions and regulations around robot rights, responsibilities, and ethical behavior in society.
epoch_themes.societal_impact: Debates on robot personhood, legal frameworks for AI and robots, and how society should adapt to these new entities.
epoch_themes.global_trends: Reflects global concerns about AI ethics, data privacy, and the integration of autonomous systems into human society.
